Value.description:
Replaces parts of the code with random numbers or character sequences when saving the file.
Usage examples: int Serial = 1234; /* RANDGEN:INT(10000) */ wxString Name = "Target"; /* RANDGEN:ALNUM(12) */
The first example replaces 1234 with a random number between 0 and 10000. The second example replaces Target with a random string containing 12 alfanumeric characters. The specifier can be ALNUM, DIGITS, CHARS, UPPERCHARS or LOWERCHARS.
